episodes.title: JWBroadcasting - How Cults Rewire The Brain / Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
Diane Benscoter spent five years as a "Moonie." She shares an insider's perspective on the mind of a cult member, and proposes a new way to think about today's most troubling conflicts and extremist movements.

https://www.ted.com/talks/ex_moonie_diane_benscoter_how_cults_think?language=en

***Please note - any third party content shown in this video rebuttal is used for the purpose of criticism and parody under the "fair use" allowance of copyright law.***
